00037 #ifndef DMXCMAP_H
00038 #define DMXCMAP_H
00039 
00040 #include "colormapst.h"
00041 
00043 typedef struct _dmxColormapPriv {
00044     Colormap  cmap;
00045 } dmxColormapPrivRec, *dmxColormapPrivPtr;
00046 
00047 
00048 extern Bool dmxCreateColormap(ColormapPtr pColormap);
00049 extern void dmxDestroyColormap(ColormapPtr pColormap);
00050 extern void dmxInstallColormap(ColormapPtr pColormap);
00051 extern void dmxStoreColors(ColormapPtr pColormap, int ndef, xColorItem *pdef);
00052 
00053 extern Bool dmxCreateDefColormap(ScreenPtr pScreen);
00054 
00055 extern Bool dmxBECreateColormap(ColormapPtr pColormap);
00056 extern Bool dmxBEFreeColormap(ColormapPtr pColormap);
00057 
00059 extern DevPrivateKey dmxColormapPrivateKey;
00060 
00062 #define DMX_SET_COLORMAP_PRIV(_pCMap, _pCMapPriv)                       \
00063     dixSetPrivate(&(_pCMap)->devPrivates, dmxColormapPrivateKey, _pCMapPriv)
00064 
00066 #define DMX_GET_COLORMAP_PRIV(_pCMap) (dmxColormapPrivPtr)              \
00067     dixLookupPrivate(&(_pCMap)->devPrivates, dmxColormapPrivateKey)
00068 
00069 #endif /* DMXCMAP_H */
